Readme:

This is the Kamael release of L2Brick.

Feedback can be given in our forums:
http://www.L2Brickdp.com/forum http://www.l2brick.funsite.cz//forum
or visit us in our IRC channels
#L2Brick or #L2Brick-datapack @ irc.freenode.net
More info can be found in README.txt that you should have received with this software.
Have fun, the Official L2Brick Development team.
